DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: North Slope Oil_Production at 85 % of Normal After Spill : Operations at Alaska ' s Prudhoe Bay field have been scaled back since Saturday as British Petroleum transferred the remaining oil from the East Lion , a tanker chartered by BP America Inc. that leaked 200 gallons of oil at the Port of Valdez . The port , the southern terminus of the Trans-Alaskan Pipeline , was closed Saturday , then partially reopened Monday . Production was slowed to keep the pipeline from carrying more oil than could be stored at Valdez .
